00040 #ifndef __CVMX_IXF18201_H__
00041 #define __CVMX_IXF18201_H__
00042 
00043 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00044 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00045 extern "C" {
00046 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 /**
00050  * Initialize the IXF18201 SPI<->XAUI MAC.
00051  * @return 1 on success
00052  *         0 on failure
00053  */
00054 int cvmx_ixf18201_init(void);
00055 
00056 /**
00057  * Read a 16 bit register from the IXF18201
00058  *
00059  * @param reg_addr Register address
00060  *
00061  * @return 16 bit register value
00062  */
00063 uint16_t cvmx_ixf18201_read16(uint16_t reg_addr);
00064 /**
00065  * Write a 16 bit IXF18201 register
00066  *
00067  * @param reg_addr Register address
00068  * @param data Value to write
00069  *
00070  */
00071 void cvmx_ixf18201_write16(uint16_t reg_addr, uint16_t data);
00072 /**
00073  * Write a 16 bit IXF18201 register
00074  *
00075  * @param reg_addr Register address (must be 4 byte aligned)
00076  *
00077  * @return 32 bit register value
00078  */
00079 uint32_t cvmx_ixf18201_read32(uint16_t reg_addr);
00080 /**
00081  * Write a 32 bit IXF18201 register
00082  *
00083  * @param reg_addr Register address (must be 4 byte aligned)
00084  * @param data Value to write
00085  *
00086  */
00087 void cvmx_ixf18201_write32(uint16_t reg_addr, uint32_t data);
00088 
00089 /**
00090  * Performs an MII clause 45 write using the MII block in IXF18201.
00091  *
00092  * @param mii_addr Device MII address
00093  * @param mmd      MMD address (block within device)
00094  * @param reg      Register address
00095  * @param val      Value to write
00096  */
00097 void cvmx_ixf18201_mii_write(int mii_addr, int mmd, uint16_t reg, uint16_t val);
00098 /**
00099  * Performs an MII clause 45 read using the MII block in IXF18201.
00100  *
00101  * @param mii_addr Device MII address
00102  * @param mmd      MMD address (block within device)
00103  * @param reg      Register address
00104  * @return  register value read from device
00105  */
00106 int cvmx_ixf18201_mii_read(int mii_addr, int mmd, uint16_t reg);
00107 
00108 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00109 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00110 }
00111 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00112 #endif
00113 #endif /*  __CVMX_IXF18201_H__ */
